function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infections through direct and indirect contacts between individuals","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases within populations","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, hand hygiene, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, hand hygiene technologies, and personal protective equipment","People":"General population, individuals in close contact with infected persons","Owner":"Health organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Waterborne transmission of contagious infections due to microbial contamination of water sources","Impact":"Potential large-scale propagation of waterborne infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Water treatment and purification, proper sanitation and waste management, and public health education","Technologies":"Water treatment technologies, sanitation technologies, and public health education tools","People":"Communities with limited access to clean water, individuals using contaminated water sources","Owner":"Government agencies, water treatment facilities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Longevity of pathogens on surfaces and in the environment leading to indirect transmission of infections","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to infections from contaminated objects and surfaces","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection of high-touch surfaces, awareness of transmission risk, and use of protective measures","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, surface cleaning technologies, and public health awareness tools","People":"General population, individuals in close proximity to contaminated surfaces","Owner":"Facility management, public health organizations"}]}
